info.title: IN-D Payables
info.description: IN-D Payables process invoices to extract key attributes like invoice numbers, vendor name, etc., and the table line items without setting up a template. When it feels less confident about the extraction, it prompts the user to validate the results extracted with an intuitive UI. IN-D Payables continuously learn over time and does support stamped/crumpled invoices, multi-page invoices and multiple invoices in batches

batch_id.description: Batch ID is an unique ID generated corresponding to every invoice uploaded in batches or uploaded as a single document
batch_id.title: Batch ID

validation_url.description: Validation URL enables you to do a manual validation of the extracted attributes via an intuitive UI
validation_url.title: Validation URL

confidence_score.description: Batch Confidence Score shows how confident IN-D is about the extracted output
confidence_score.title: Batch Confidence Score

batch_details.description: This object gives you the information about the uploaded batch along with a Validation URL for manual validation and a Batch Confidence Score

num_records.description: Number of Records shows the total number of invoices in the batch
num_records.title: Number of Records

desc.description: Error Description helps you understand what went wrong in the other side
desc.title: Error Description

file_name.description: File name of the invoice uploaded for reference
file_name.title: Invoice file name

conf_score.title: Field Confidence Score - Invoice number

columns.description: First row of the table is considered as the Header for each Column

data.description: Each item corresponds to the values extracted in a row against the Header items

table_data.description: The line items in the Table is extracted

result.description: The Result Data for the whole batch of invoices
